site_name: Westcott Lodge 22 Lower MallLondonW6 9DJ
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1: REAR Garden - Cherry (dying) - Fell tree to a point as close to ground level. (final height of stump to be confirmed by client on day of works). Treat stump with Ecoplug system.T2: REAR Garden - Cherry (triple stemmed) - Remove 2x leaning/compromised stems. Crown reduce remaining stem by up to 2m to reshape and balance, remove any deadwood.T3: REAR Garden - Hornbeam - Crown lift to give 3m clearance from ground level.T4: REAR Garden - Cherry - Crown lift to give 3m clearance from ground level.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
